courseData.title: Chemistry
courseData.description: In the chemistry course, you will study substances, their structure, properties, and reactions, with hands-on laboratory practice.

courseData.title: Biology
courseData.description: In the biology course, you will study living organisms, their structure, life processes, and ecological interactions.
